name: Slotty Church
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41

A combination of Gambling games and Religious Educational game, which is due to the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". Intended to be like the old Wisdom Tree games. The whole "educational" bit never came, it would have been simple bible related trivia, like in the old games. I am not religious, I don't mean any disrespect and tried to approach it as Wisdom Tree did back then,which was to basically re-skin games that weren't Christian to start with.

No sound, no game over screen, and not a lot of fun. It's a slot machine. The plan was to have an upgrade system and make it into an incremental clicker (the Test Of Faiths were in prevision of that) but I mismanaged my time (by thinking that LD was 48h... when did that change?)

Built on HaxeFlixel, art done in Inkscape and The Gimp 2.

Edit: I posted a final version at 9:41, to fix a stupid but that stopped all winnings on the 2nd wheel. I left the original sources (which contain a build) posted.
